item.title: Error please help!
item.description:
@127.0.0.1 wrote:

ok here is the error pic

here is the tut

Purpose: Giving away prizes randomly to people who are online!

Difficulty: 2/10

Base: N/A

Knowledge: None

Classes: Client.java

STEP ONE:

Find:

public boolean process

above it add…

public String[] names = server.playerHandler.players[].playerName; public int Chance = misc.random(1000); public void giveAway() { int randomPlayer = misc.random(names.length); if(Chance == 300) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = names[randomPlayer] + " has just won some serious cash!"; if(playerName == names[randomPlayer]) addItem(995, 2147000000); } }

below public boolean process add this

giveAway();

anyone kno how to fix it? how it should be put… like it would help if u took a pic of the correct way to put it in notepad!!
